paragraph: Spaghetti carbonara is a classic Italian dish that's loved by chefs and home cooks alike. To make this dish, start by cooking spaghetti until it's al dente.

header: Pan-Seared Scallops with Lemon Butter Sauce
paragraph: Pan-seared scallops with lemon butter sauce is a simple yet elegant dish that's perfect for a special occasion.
Grilled steak with chimichurri sauce is a classic dish that never goes out of style. To make this dish, start by grilling a juicy steak to your desired level of doneness.
